content.text: Hey! My name is (User 1 name)! What's yours?
What do you do for a living?
I work in telecommunications and I'm a mom of two
That's awesome! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to play D&D and watch anime
Me too! I really like archery and running. I'm trying to set a good example for my younger sibling
That's really cool! I'm not much of a runner, but I love to sleep
Hahaha, I love to sleep too! I used to write short stories and make movies when I was a kid, I'm also not interested in marriage
That's awesome! I'm going to sign up for a singing competition to show my parents I can make a career out of it. I was a sniper in the army before
Oh wow, that's amazing! I'm sure you'll do great!
That's awesome! I love the color blue
I love blue too! I think we're going to be great friend
